history.content: It's 1 year from start date and then you have to apply for an extension which can go up to 2 more years - and yes OPT extension applies fro CS majors as well!

In OPT tutorial, it's stated 

The end date will usually be 1 year from your start date (i.e. a July 2 start date will have a July 1 end date.)

But, does this apply to CS major as well?

Wouldn't it be 2 years for STEM major?

Thanks!
history.subject: What is the OPT end date for the CS major?

history.content:
In OPT tutorial, it's stated 

The end date will usually be 1 year from your start date (i.e. a July 2 start date will have a July 1 end date.)

But, does this apply to CS major as well?

Wouldn't it be 3 years for STEM major?

Thanks!
history.subject: What is the OPT end date for the CS major?
